api_info.title: DigitalOcean API
api_info.description: The DigitalOcean API allows programmatic access to manage DigitalOcean resources.

tools.name: one_clicks_list
tools.description: List all available 1-Click applications.

tools.name: one_clicks_install_kubernetes
tools.description: Install a 1-Click Kubernetes application.

tools.description: Retrieve information about the current account.

tools.description: List all SSH keys associated with the account.

tools.description: Retrieve a specific SSH key by identifier.

params.description: The ID or fingerprint of the SSH key.

tools.description: Delete an SSH key.

params.description: The ID or fingerprint of the SSH key.
